definition: a hand tool that is used to hold or twist a nut or bolt, twist suddenly so as to sprain
details:
noun
- a hand tool that is used to hold or twist a nut or bolt
= synonyms: spanner
- a jerky pulling movement
= synonyms: twist
- a sharp strain on muscles or ligaments
= example: a sharp strain on muscles or ligaments
= synonyms: pull
verb
- twist suddenly so as to sprain
= example: twist suddenly so as to sprain
= synonyms: twist
- twist and compress, as if in pain or anguish
= synonyms: wring
- twist or pull violently or suddenly, especially so as to remove (something) from that to which it is attached or from where it originates
= example: twist or pull violently or suddenly, especially so as to remove (something) from that to which it is attached or from where it originates
= synonyms: twist
- make a sudden twisting motion
